name: Jamaicans Be Like
description:
Getting bored want to play a Jamaican themed App? Jamaicans Be Like will keep you entertained for hours while listening to Reggae and Dancehall. Play 15 or more minigames hilarious and addictive Jamaica themed mini-games in an attempt to unlock new Jamaican new minigames items to have fun. Reggae, Dancehall , Blue Draws , Dutch Pot and more, believe me it's all there

GAMEPLAY:
- Squash the Mosquito!
- Red Handed, stealing food!
- Pick the Coconut
- Free World Boss

This 100% free app will amuse and challenge you whether you're a Jamaican or a lover of Jamaica.
